Html:
Hi, i just last week found this superb looking UI while starting to learn my self WPF (always done winforms before).

I wish to use this mui in my companys work, where we are going to develope an application, right now, for only our use, but parhaps later sell it to customers who think this software would be good to have.

I have read the licence, but its, to me, not that easy to understand what i really can do with this.
I will probably not be a contributor, unless i find some bugs and report it.

I might try answer questions on this discussionboard when i can.
